attributes.action: Scrap visa requirements for Ukrainian refugees
attributes.background: Many countries have waived the requirement for Ukrainian citizens to have visas before entering. As things currently stand, Ukrainian nationals need a visa before boarding a plane to the UK. The government must remove this requirement, so that Ukrainian citizens can come and live safely.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
